BasicInfo.short: SlideRocket is an online presentation platform that allows users to create, manage, share and measure presentations.

Products.name: SlideRocket
Products.description: Sliderocket is an online tool that allows users to upload and edit PowerPoint presentations, create new slide presentations online, access
